review: This item does not work long term.  The positive reviews on here must be made early on after getting the item. This roku stops in the middle of my shows every time now and I have to do a factory reset. After going through the whole process to set it up, it encounters same problem and I start over. Now I have to factory reset in the middle of every episode. I looked it up and apparently a common problem. Look up "roku loads to 25% only" and you'll see what I mean. I'm tired of messing with it. Now it's too late too return it of course so I'm just stuck finding another means to watch my Netflix. Don't waste your time.

review: Love my Roku. The streaming stick does perform much slower than the more expensive models. It sometimes hangs up and you have to wait for it to catch up. For this reason I think I would have been happier upgrading. If you do not mind 10 - 15 second periods were the Roku does not seen to respond then this model will work just fine for you. This issue just happens when navigating menues and does not effect the streaming experience. Videos stream smooth, great HD picture and sound.
